virtual void logError (class cepError &error)=0

Detailed Description

Abstract error handler. this should be made a friend of cepError to allow it to extract private data without poluting the cepError interface with accessors

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.1 $

Blake Swadling <blake@swadling.org>
